title: A Flavour of German - Lesson 03
description: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 03 you will learn idiomatic German phrases associated with colours. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
content:encoded: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 03 you will learn idiomatic German phrases associated with colours. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
itunes:subtitle: Use idiomatic German phrases associated with colours
